title: A Cynical Principle - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Maids   Male Protagonist   Vampires
author: Fuji Kaori   不二 香
description:
‘If it’s something that can be destroyed, destroy it.’

In the Dark Age of the late 15th Century, a vampire, named Charlo de Univale, lived in a remote countryside of Southern France.

Throughout his life, he has been accompanied by a maid named Partita Infinee, a beautiful woman that surpassed all of the vampire’s weakness and followed by happy companions.

A short medieval vampire series featuring gothic and baroque people.>
